Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
CAN: The student might be able to draw two figures that loosely represent students without specific context or detail.
The student might include a line between the figures that could represent the string, although it may not be connected properly or clearly represent a telephone.
CANNOT: The student is unlikely to clearly illustrate the concept of sound traveling through the string correctly (may not understand how sound travels).
The student might not effectively show the purpose of the string telephone in facilitating communication (may not grasp that the string is essential for transmitting sound).
The student is unlikely to demonstrate details showing how the string telephone solves communication problems (may not see or depict communication as a problem).
The student might not include any additional elements to demonstrate how long-distance communication helps people (lacks understanding of applications or benefits).
